Matthias De Paolis is a  AI Engineer and Data Scientist at [Yarowa AG](https://www.yarowa.com/), serving as the head of post-training. He holds a Master in Applied Information and Data Science from the university of applied science in Lucerne.

Connect with him on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/matthiasdepaolis/) @matthiasdepaolis.
